item.title: ORRSTOWN FINANCIAL SERVICES INC 10-K
item.description: ORRSTOWN FINANCIAL SERVICES INC, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 11, 2022 had 48169 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
